ideal_referral: Manufacturing & Assembly SMEs Wholesale Distributors & Traders Consultants & Advisors Chartered Accountant (CA) or Business Coach specializing in Manufacturing SMEs
top_problem_solved: Inventory Leakage & Pilferage The Pain: Manufacturers buying raw materials but getting less finished output due to undocumented wastage or theft on the factory floor. The Fix: We implement digital "Checkpoints" that track material movement, flagging variances instantly. Operational Blindness The Pain: Business owners making decisions based on gut feeling because their data is trapped in disconnected Excel sheets and Tally, leading to cash flow crunches. The Fix: We build a "Digital Brain" that aggregates data into one dashboard, allowing decisions based on real-time facts. Sales Process Fragmentation The Pain: Leads and orders getting lost in WhatsApp chats or notebooks, resulting in missed revenue and lack of accountability for sales staff. The Fix: We centralize all communication and order-taking into one mobile-friendly system that the owner controls.

top_product: My top products include high-quality AHD and IP CCTV cameras, Wi-Fi PTZ cameras with mobile viewing, and DVR/NVR systems with motion alerts. I also provide reliable alarm systems and biometric access controls—trusted by homes, shops, and industries for complete security.
ideal_referral: My ideal referral is anyone looking to install or upgrade CCTV or security systems—whether it's a homeowner, shop owner, school, office, or industrial client. I especially value referrals from satisfied customers, electricians, builders, and IT professionals.
top_problem_solved: One of the top problems I’ve resolved is fixing unclear video footage and remote viewing issues for clients. By upgrading cameras, optimizing DVR settings, and setting up mobile access properly, I’ve helped many customers get crystal-clear visuals and smooth remote monitoring.
my_favourite_bni_story: My favourite BNI story is when I received a CCTV installation referral from a fellow member, which led to three more referrals through that one satisfied client. It proved the power of trust and quality service, and how BNI connections can grow business beyond expectations.
